author: jukka
msg: Prepare for the 1.2.0 release by automating some more of the release process.

author: mfreedman
msg: Scott neglected to add the <layout>legacy</layout> tag when adding the java maven 1 repository to the pom. This fixes that.

author: jonesde
msg: Fixed issue with XML reserved characters in screen and form data, they will now be encoded and display properly instead of causing an error about bad formatting in an entity

author: rhuijben
msg: (svn_client_status5): Following up on r957637, revert the conversion
from depth unknown to depth empty, as that makes svn_ra_status2()
report excluded nodes (which might be a bug, but is also a feature).
But do set depth infinity for the lock retrievals.

author: jchris
msg: patch mochijson2 to allow output of big integers not in float form (it stores them just fine)
